text: tatha kaha kaafiron ne ki hamapar pralay nahin aayegee. aap kah den: kyon nahin? mere paalanahaar kee shapath! -vah tumapar avashy aayegee- jo paroksh ka gyaanee hai. nahin chhupa rah sakata usase kan baraabar (bhee) aakaashon tatha dharatee mein, na usase chhotee koee cheez aur na badee, kintu, vah khulee pustak mein (ankit) hai
